name: Synpress
description: Synpress is e2e testing framework based on Cypress.io and playwright with support for metamask. It's a pioneer tool in web3 e2e testing with potential to evolve into a decentralized network of test runners (and CI provider) in future. Itâ€™s currently used by multiple different projects on Optimism network (~140 repos on Github): https://github.com/Synthetixio/synpress/network/dependents
